lead_paragraph: Jim Furyk was No. 7 in the world, No. 9 in the FedEx Cup standings and already assured a spot on the Presidents Cup team when he tied for fourth in the Deutsche Bank Championship for his seventh top 10 of the year.

headline.print_headline: Furyk Opts for Wrist Surgery, Will Miss 3 Months and Masters
headline.main: Furyk Opts for Wrist Surgery, Will Miss 3 Months and Masters

snippet: Jim Furyk was No. 7 in the world, No. 9 in the FedEx Cup standings and already assured a spot on the Presidents Cup team when he tied for fourth in the Deutsche Bank Championship for his seventh top 10 of the year....
